title: Kinematics - Distance traveled by an object

content.description: The graph shows acceleration as a function of time data for an object that is at rest at time <math alttext="t equals 0 seconds" overflow="scroll"> <mi>t</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>0</mn> <mspace width="0.2em"> </mspace> <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi> </math>.
content.question: What is the displacement of the object between <math alttext="t equals 0 seconds" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math> and <math alttext="t equals 2 seconds" overflow="scroll"> <mi>t</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>2</mn> <mspace width="0.2em"> </mspace> <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi> </math>?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
